title: Neither Futura nor Century, anyone who knows?
author: Edamame

comments.content:
I don't have the answer for your, but could you please stop creating new threads with same question. If you forgot something, you can edit your post, so you don't have to create a new one. You just have to be patient, someone will have the answer.

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201145610/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

One thread please!

This looks a lot like P22 Underground Thin, but itâ€™s not quite it.

It's very close to [P22 Underground Pro Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201145610/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro/p22-underground-pro-thin/), but there might well be a free font that comes close.  
I found it with [WhatTheFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201145610/http:/new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=C&ch%5B1%5D=Q&wtfserver=node7.ric.mf&id=00005f1c4ae74cd1000721eb00000b86&glyphcount=2&imageid=15839843), you might wanna check that out first when you have a font question.

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201145610/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

Ha!, just quicker than me, Frode! :)

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201145610/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

You're right Queneau, the free font Geo Sans comes close...

Jeo.

Thanks a lot!  
Still looking, want to find the old school version.  
If anyone finds it, it would be great!!

It's the first time I made a comment on the forum, that's why there where more than one thread.  
//Edamame
